<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>

<s> total area is the sum of all land and water areas delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
<s> land area is the aggregate of all surfaces delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines excluding inland water bodies lakes reservoirs rivers <\s>
<s> water area is the sum of the surfaces of all inland water bodies such as lakes reservoirs or rivers as delimited by international boundaries and or coastlines <\s>
